name: Flickr Net Tags Community (FNTC)
short_description: FNTC fetch some data from the Flickr service (information about image and tags), build the graph image's tags-neighborhood-graph and study it's property.FNTC recupera info su immagini e relativi tag da Flickr e studia il grafo prodotto da questi ultimi
